column4: how can I install OpenOffice 2.0.1 on my ubuntu ? I've downloaded the file and after extracting it I have lots of RPMs.
how can I install OpenOffice 2.0.1 on my ubuntu ? I've downloaded the file and after extracting it I have lots of RPMs.
throw the package and the .rpm into away and use the package manager 'synaptic' to install openoffice
see !easysource on how to enable the repositories for latest openoffice
